name: Orange!
description:
This is not a game not even a prototype! All you have to do is look at an orange on a table! 

Why its price? All purchases of this game will be exclusively to buy food for my little dog shelter that I have in my house, with the purchases I will be uploading updates of images and proof that all the money will be to buy dog food! 

Don't expect to play a good game for its price "1$" the money is to help the stray dogs in my area, thank you very much!

With esc you close the game.
